name: T - Emma Layla
_source: speak;Layla; Agh! Who are you?!{w} Wait{tgm}...{tgm} You don't look like any of the bandits.
speak;Emma; Because I'm not one.{w} My group came to help exterminate these criminals.
speak;Layla; Well, if you're here to help{tgm}...{tgm}{w} My name is Layla. I'm a researcher of dark magic.
speak;Emma; I'm Emma, an elemental magic apprentice.{w} My friends and I are have come to warn other villages after ours was destroyed.
speak;Layla; You're from that other village!{w} The one that that woman said there was nothing left of!
speak;Emma; It was completely destroyed by demons{tgm}...{tgm}{w}but how do you know that?
speak;Emma; I know, it's surprising, and{tgm}...{tgm} there's a lot to go over.{w} Let's talk once this is all over with.
speak;Layla; Well, consider me your ally, then.{w} I'll tell my family what's going on.
